description: This file defines and configures multiple AI agents, tools, teams, and a playground for a reasoning demo, including setting up database storage, external knowledge sources, and agent behaviors.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, models, and behaviors.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Handles external URL-based knowledge sources with vector database integration.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Main class for setting up and serving the interactive reasoning playground.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents working together with shared instructions and configurations.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles SQLite database storage for agent data and configurations.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Vector database implementation for knowledge retrieval.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the FastAPI app instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the playground server with specified app and reload options.
